name: Bonkers (Raccoon Formality)
description:
Controls:
mouse = move
left-click = tilt left
right-click = tilt right
(for best experience, use external mouse)
I made this game in around 2 hours because I was bored. If you are getting lag on the web build, please consider downloading the executable. I hope you enjoy and have a great rest of your day! :)

Credits:
song = The Entertainer by Scott Joplin (1902, public domain)
Send a screenshot of your high score in the comments and I will try to keep this leader-board updated:
Name:Score:Patrick101Matthew69
